item.title: How You Can Wear Your Response to Jimmy Hoffa on Your Chest
item.description:
And support the St. Louis Tea Party Coalition. Order the Tea Party S.O.B. Brigade T-Shirt. The AUTHENTIC goods, designed by Chris Loesch.
Available for a limited time. Orders ship shortly. Jump in. Everybody wants to see these on the streets of St. Louis. Order yours today. Click to Order

item.title: Tea Party Gear Store Open Again
item.description: Sorry for the interruption, but we’ve worked out the kinks. Do you want to show the world your colors? Do you want to say, “I’m a tea partier?” Do you want your style to shout, “FREEDOM!” Then get to the official St. Louis Tea Party store and stock up. We’ve added T.E.A. ball caps to go with the T.E.A Special Forces t-shirts (our best seller). You’ll look terrific reading Zen Conservatism in your Tea Party Hoodie!
